# GKMatchType.hosted

**Case**

A match hosted on your private server.

## Declaration

```swift
case hosted
```

## Types

- **GKMatchType.peerToPeer**: A peer-to-peer match hosted by Game Center.
- **GKMatchType.turnBased**: A turn-based match hosted by Game Center.
